Saxa MBA FT23

Communicators & Collaborators | Global Leaders | Problem-Solvers

Portfolio

About

The SAXA MBA FT23 cohort is a remarkable group of individuals who are not just classmates, but a close-knit family. We are a highly communicative and collaborative group who have taken on multiple leadership roles in various clubs and extracurricular activities. We actively participate in the group, where we share their experiences, challenges, and ideas, and offer support to each other whenever needed.

Our cohort has completed over 20 projects as part of different study teams, and even ventured abroad during the GBE to gain international exposure. We have shown exemplary leadership qualities by serving as Leadership Fellows for the Class of 2023, and have won numerous prizes and competitions, demonstrating our ability to work under pressure and deliver exceptional results.

Despite our busy schedules and demanding coursework, the SAXA MBA FT23 cohort never fails to support and encourage one another. We are a team of cool-headed individuals who work together effectively to achieve our goals, while also nurturing strong bonds that will last beyond our time at the business school.

Around the Web

About MySaxaMBA

MySaxaMBA is a free to use, theme created by Start Bootstrap Template .

Copyright © MySaxaMBA 2023

International Festival

SAXA is a representation of 40 different countries, and recently showcased its diversity by participating in an international festival.

Leadership Communication

SAXA participated in the Executive Leadership Communication Challenge, and several of its members were recognized as Leadership Fellows for the first year MBA class.

Hallowen 2023

SAXA is known for being very active in celebrating holidays, especially Halloween, and the 2023 Halloween celebration was particularly memorable with many expressive and creative costumes.

Gamers

SAXA is known for its playful spirit and love for games, always finding ways to have fun and enjoy themselves.

Moon Festival

The SAXA MBA cohort is comprised of individuals from diverse backgrounds, including Chinese, Korean, Japanese, and many more, and they enjoy celebrating cultural festivals such as the Autumn Moon Festival together.

Globa Business Experience (GBE) Ghana

SAXA MBA students have had the opportunity to travel to various countries for their Global Business Experience (GBE) projects, and my team had the chance to work on projects related to energy transition, global expansion, and finance while in Ghana.
